Fwirl Docs

Fwirl is a very simple, yet highly configurable Spigot plugin for common features.

Documentation Download

Highly configurable

Fwirl has great documentation and it provides lots of customization.

Many useful features

Easily create a welcome message, stop non-operator players from joining, use quick gamemode commands and much more.

Support and feedback via GitHub issues

Plugin not working? Need help configuring it? Have suggestions for new features? Just create a GitHub issue!
